title: West Tampa Cigars... From Corporate to Independent with Rick Rodriguez
itunes:title: West Tampa Cigars... From Corporate to Independent with Rick Rodriguez
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire... We are joined by Rick Rodriguez who you may know from his days at CAO. These days he owns West Tampa Tobacco Company and we discuss his road from corporate to independent.

We will fire up a West Tampa Black in the first hour which is part of the The Cigar Authority Care package and in the second hour we will fire up El Baton from JC Newman Cigar Company.

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Cigar News, The email of the week and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

The Cigar Authority broadcasts live on Saturday at 12noon on our website, TheCigarAuthority.com as well as Facebook Live, YouTube and is available on your favorite podcast catcher.
